about.me: A3C's MISSON = Assist Cardano with banking the unbanked by donating 20% of our personal margin rewards to kiva.org & helping the community by offering free Crypto advice/support via our website, Twitter, Discord & YouTube. Our goal is to be 100% green through Tesla Solar Roof & Starlink when available in our area.
about.server: 1 relay registered on-chain, 3 unlisted relays to prevent DoS attacks.  Infrastructure currently hosted on AWS using t3.large instances.
about.company: A3C was created to help the community by providing reliable information and safe practices on how to invest in Cryptocurrency.
